title: Is it possible to disable the Launcher Pop-up during champion select?
body:
I'm getting seriously annoyed by the launcher. It pops up 3 times, ban phase, pick phase and final preperation phase.
 I usually play other games during that time and i DO NOT want the launcher to pop up and close my games/applications.
 I missed a few important moments because of the tab switch delay.
Can i turn that feature off because it wass clearly made for people who cannot time their picks.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: my client doesnt pop since latest update and i missed lots of champ select cause of that... is it normal ?

Once you're in champion select, its best to stay there to make sure that you're catching everything that happens. You're also missing out on some team communication as well. There isn't a way to stop the client from popping up, since the client needs to alert you to what's going on in the game lobby.
